app.title: White-label Demo
app.subtitle: A beautiful template for your next mini app project
app.description: This demo showcases all the features available in the miniapps monorepo template, including internationalization, theming, analytics, and browser storage.

persistence.title: Storage Demo
persistence.description: Enter some text and save it. It will persist in your browser using IndexedDB.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Full ES/EN support with localized routing

theming.title: Theme Support
theming.description: Light, dark, and system themes with toggle

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.subtitle: Follow these steps to create your first mini app

clone.title: Clone the repository
clone.description: Clone this template to your local machine using git clone

install.title: Install dependencies
install.description: Run pnpm install to install all dependencies

run.title: Start development
run.description: Run pnpm --filter whitelabel-demo dev to start the development server

customize.title: Customize your app
customize.description: Edit the files in apps/whitelabel-demo to create your own mini app

learnMore.title: Learn More
learnMore.subtitle: Discover all the features included in this template

turborepo.title: Turborepo
turborepo.description: Monorepo management with caching and parallel execution for fast builds

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Full support for ES/EN with next-intl and localized routing

themes.title: Theme System
themes.description: Light, dark, and system themes with next-themes

analytics.title: Google Analytics
analytics.description: GA4 integration ready to track your app usage

storage.title: Browser Storage
storage.description: IndexedDB and localStorage helpers for data persistence

vercel.title: Vercel Deploy
vercel.description: Ready to deploy each app as a separate Vercel project

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Quick reference for the template structure
